mapper.select: select count(pm.phone_number) + count(um.user_phone) as result from phoneNumber_list_mst pm left outer join user_mst um on(pm.phone_number = um.user_phone) where pm.phone_number = #{signUpPhone}
select count(user_email) as result from user_mst where user_email = #{signUpEmail}
mapper.insert: insert into user_mst values( 0, #{signUpEmail}, #{signUpPassword}, #{signUpPhone}, #{signUpBirthday}, #{signUpGender}, now(), now() )
